317.description: Redirects to deck2 website with authentication code

parameters.description: URl to be redirected after the successful login Example: GET /auth/login?redirect=example.com/some/path On a successful login, you'll be redirected to example.com/some/path/{generated_authentication_token}
parameters.name: redirect

parameters.description: JWT token sent to be verified
parameters.name: token

post.summary: Creates and adds a new session to the current event (must have coordinator credentials)

parameters.description:
Session to store on the current event
 - kind: TALK, PRESENTATION or WORKSHOP
 - if kind=TALK, then speaker must be specified
 - if kind=PRESENTATION or kind=WORKSHOP, then company must be specified
 - dinamizers is optional
 - space is optional
parameters.name: session

 - videoURL is optional
